howToEarn.question: How do I earn commission?
howToEarn.answer: You earn 10% commission on every purchase made by users who sign up using your referral link.

whenPaid.question: When do I get paid?
whenPaid.answer: Commissions are paid out monthly, provided you have earned at least $50 in commission.

linkDuration.question: How long does the referral link work?
linkDuration.answer: Your referral link works indefinitely. Once someone signs up using your link, you will earn commission on their first purchase.

tracking.question: Can I track my referrals?
tracking.answer: Yes! You can track all your referrals and earnings in real-time through your ambassador dashboard.

trackOrder.title: Track Your Order
trackOrder.subtitle: Enter your order ID to track your order status

whatIs.title: What is Coba T-shirts?
whatIs.description: We are a print-on-demand company that offers high-quality t-shirts, sweaters, hoodies, tote bags, and many more products with custom designs. You can choose from our wide range of designs or upload your own to create unique and personalized products.

howWorks.title: How does print-on-demand work?
howWorks.description: Print-on-demand means that we only print and ship your products when you order them. This way, we avoid waste and overstock, and we can offer you more variety and flexibility. You can order as many or as few products as you want, and we will deliver them to you in a timely manner.

benefits.title: What are the benefits of print-on-demand?
benefits.description: Print-on-demand has many benefits for both customers and sellers. Some of them are:

list.1: You can create your own products with your own designs, logos, slogans, etc.
list.2: You can access a large catalog of products and designs without having to invest in inventory or storage space.
list.3: You can save money on production and shipping costs, as you only pay for what you sell.
list.4: You can reduce your environmental impact, as you avoid waste and emissions from mass production and transportation.

printing.title: What printing methods do you use?
printing.description: We use different printing methods depending on the product and the design. Some of the most common ones are:

dtf.name: DTF (Direct to Film)
dtf.description: This method uses a special film that transfers the design onto the fabric using heat and pressure. It produces vibrant colors and high-resolution images that last long and feel soft on the skin.

dtg.name: DTG (Direct to Garment)
dtg.description: This method uses a printer that applies ink directly onto the fabric. It allows for more detail and color variation than other methods, and it works well on cotton and cotton-blend fabrics.

sublimation.name: Sublimation
sublimation.description: This method uses heat to transfer dye onto synthetic fabrics. It creates durable and fade-resistant prints that cover the entire surface of the product. It is ideal for printing on curved or irregular shapes.

screen.name: Screen Printing
screen.description: This method uses a screen mesh and plastisol-based inks to press the design onto the fabric. It produces crisp and opaque images that can withstand multiple washes. It is ideal for high-volume orders and simple designs with few colors.

embroidery.name: Embroidery
embroidery.description: This method uses a needle and thread to stitch the design onto the fabric. It produces textured and elegant images that add value to the garment. It is ideal for logos, monograms, and small details.

vinyl.name: Vinyl
vinyl.description: This method uses a vinyl cutter to cut out the design from a sheet of vinyl material. The design is then transferred onto the fabric using heat and pressure. It produces smooth and glossy images that are suitable for outdoor use. It is ideal for lettering, numbers, and shapes.

returns.title: Return Policy
returns.intro: Thank you for your purchase. We hope you are happy with your purchase. However, if you are not completely satisfied with your purchase for any reasons, you may return it to us for an exchange only. Please see below for more information on our return policy.

returns.title: Returns
returns.description: All returns must be postmarked within five (5) days of the purchase date. All returned items must be in new and unused condition, with all original tags and labels attached.

process.title: Return Process
process.description: To return an item, please email customer service at
process.note: Please note, you will be responsible for all return shipping charges. We strongly recommend that you use a trackable method to mail your return.

refunds.title: Refunds
refunds.description: After receiving your return and inspecting the condition of your item, we will process your exchange. Please allow at least seven (7) days from the receipt of your item to process your exchange. We will notify you by email when your return has been processed.

exceptions.title: Exceptions
exceptions.description: For defective or damaged products, please contact us at the contact details below to arrange a refund or exchange.

list.1: A 25% restocking fee will be charged for all returns.
list.2: Sale items are FINAL SALE and cannot be returned.

questions.title: Questions
questions.description: If you have any questions concerning our return policy, please contact us at
